response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $1,200,000 to you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,050,000, which represents a significant saving compared to its market value. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your interest and commitment to quality and excellence.

Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you through the purchasing process.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1050000}
